name: Bakuli Jungle Wraps
flavorText: "Unbearable creatures of the night plagued the Bakuli Jungle region. They were dangerous and not easily seen. It was a wonder that we all survived." -Account of Tapeks, Krum, Astraelly, Tanooki, Franklin, Kuan, and Tiget, the last known group of adventurers to pass through alive.
flavorTextHtml: "Unbearable creatures of the night plagued the Bakuli Jungle region. They were dangerous and not easily seen. It was a wonder that we all survived." -Account of Tapeks, Krum, Astraelly, Tanooki, Franklin, Kuan, and Tiget, the last known group of adventurers to pass through alive.

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

secondary.textHtml: Firebats deals 257% increased damage to enemies affected by Locust Swarm or Piranhas. (Witch Doctor Only) [250 - 300]%
